mapper.sql: catid, module, type, modelid, domain, parentid, arrparentid, child, catname, image, parentdir, catdir, url, hits, listorder, ismenu, sethtml, letter
mapper.select: select CATID,PARENTID,CATNAME from jbr_category where CATNAME = #{catname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CATID,PARENTID,CATNAME from jbr_category where PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.insert: insert into jbr_category (catid, module, type, modelid, domain, parentid, arrparentid, child, catname, image, parentdir, catdir, url, hits, listorder, ismenu, sethtml, letter, arrchildid, description, setting) values (#{catid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{module,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{modelid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{arrparentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{child,jdbcType=BIT}, #{catname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentdir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catdir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{listorder,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{ismenu,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sethtml,jdbcType=BIT}, #{letter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{arrchildid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{setting,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
